DOC.brief_summary: The investigator interested use personalized , self-motivating message motivate people exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Using Self-Motivating Messages Encourage People Exercise More
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator interested use personalized , self-motivating message motivate people exercise . Through partnership university , investigator run large-scale , randomized field control trial aim increase exercise frequency 100-day challenge . The primary purpose study test whether send people motivate message write past keep engage challenge motivate exercise frequently . One week challenge , employee sign challenge receive email invite participate short activity . Employees click link direct survey . Once finish reading first introductory page click `` next '' , randomly assign one two group . In control group , employee encourage write think motivate walk 20 , 50 , 90 day Challenge . These employee receive standard reminder 20th , 50th , 90th day challenge . In treatment group , employee encourage write motivating message receive 20th , 50th , 90th day Challenge . All employee expose either control treatment condition include analysis . The investigator plan explore moderator base ( ) employee ' demographic ( age , gender , ethnicity , position ) , ( b ) employee ' participation previous challenge , ( c ) employee ' health condition fitness level prior challenge ( actively participate wellness activity , health statistic ) .
DOC.criteria: Employees click link invite participate activity assign either treatment control condition
